Linear ACT-31B, 1-Channel Block Coded Key Ring Transmitter

Compatible with all Linear access receivers and controllers , Supplied with quick-disconnect key ring, Sold in lots of 10, Power: Two 2016 batteries, Codes: Factory block coded in MegaCode format, RF frequency: 318 MHz. The Linear ACT-31B 1-Channel Block Coded Key Ring Transmitter is designed for use with Linear’s access control products. The Linear ACT-31B is a single-channel device supplied with a quick-disconnect key ring. Also included are lithium batteries with a five-year service life. A unique 10-second time-out feature prevents the system from being shut down by a single transmitter transmitting continuously.
